lead_paragraph: Budget cuts mean taxpayers are being deprived of their rights.
snippet: Budget cuts mean taxpayers are being deprived of their rights.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Dave Du Val, vice president at TaxAudit.com, warns Internal Revenue Service's budget cuts could deprive taxpayers of rights set out in 2014; holds cuts have resulted in expedited audits that make it extremely difficult for taxpayers to respond on time, potentially landing them in United States Tax Court in state of deficiency before they understand situation; calls on Congress to increase budget.
